roleset.name: parental guidance movie rating

example.text: He lay on the ground while I looked up our class schedule on my iPad ! And he put his hand on my leg -LRB- below the knee ... this is PG after all -RRB- and I clasped his hand and he squeezed mine and we squeezed hands back and forth until I woke

roleset.note: PG-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. (from pg.01-j)
